requirements.title: Requirements
items: Active Bitrix24 account (any plan with Contact Center)
Administrator access to Bitrix24
Active WhatsApp Business number
Stable internet connection

steps.title: Installation Steps
items: Access the Bitrix24 Marketplace and search for 'Thoth.AI WhatsApp'
Click 'Install' and authorize the requested permissions
Wait for the installation to complete (usually less than 1 minute)
Access the app through the side menu or Contact Center
Follow the initial setup wizard to connect your first WhatsApp number

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Connection
whatsapp.description: Connect your WhatsApp Business to start receiving and sending messages through Bitrix24.
steps: In the Thoth.AI panel, click 'Add Instance'
Choose the connection type: QR Code or WhatsApp Business API
For QR Code: Scan the code with the WhatsApp app on your phone
For Business API: Enter your Gupshup credentials (App ID and API Key)
Wait for the connection confirmation (green status)
Your number is now ready to be linked to an Open Channel

openChannels.title: Open Channels Configuration
openChannels.description: Configure the Open Channel connector to route messages to your service team.
steps: Go to 'Contact Center' > 'Open Channels' in Bitrix24
Create a new channel or edit an existing one
Click 'Connect' and select the WhatsApp instance to link
Configure work hours, welcome message, and routing rules
Save the settings and test by sending a message to your WhatsApp

aiBot.title: AI Bot Configuration
aiBot.description: Set up the AI assistant to automatically respond to customers when the team is unavailable or to handle initial screening.

features.title: Available Features
items: Automatic responses based on knowledge base
Natural language understanding with AI
Custom persona with name and personality
Automatic escalation to human agent
Multi-language support
Configurable response delay

setup.title: Setup Steps
steps: Access the 'Personas' section in the Thoth.AI panel
Create a new persona or edit the default
Define the name, description, and system instructions
Go to 'Training' to add documents and FAQs
In 'Instances', enable the bot for the desired instance
Configure the temperature (creativity) and welcome message
Test the bot by sending messages to your WhatsApp

contactSync.title: Contact Synchronization
contactSync.description: Keep your contacts synchronized between WhatsApp and Bitrix24 CRM.
features: Name and profile picture import from WhatsApp
Linking with existing CRM contacts by phone
Conversation history on the contact card

items.question: QR Code doesn't appear or expires quickly
items.answer: Check your internet connection. If the problem persists, log out from all WhatsApp Web sessions and try again. Make sure the phone's WhatsApp is up to date.

items.question: Messages are not arriving at Bitrix24
items.answer: Verify that the WhatsApp instance is connected (green status). Check if the Open Channel connector is correctly configured. Make sure the WhatsApp number is linked to an active line.

items.question: Messages sent from Bitrix24 are not delivered
items.answer: Check if the phone number includes the country code (e.g., +55). Verify that the contact hasn't blocked your number. For Business API, check if you have sufficient credits.

items.question: AI bot is not responding
items.answer: Check if the bot is enabled in the instance settings. Verify that there are trained documents in the 'Training' section. Make sure the attendance mode is set to 'Bot' or 'Hybrid'.

items.question: Connection was lost
items.answer: For QR Code connections, the link may be lost if the phone is offline for an extended period. Reconnect using a new QR Code. For Business API, check if your API credentials are still valid.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Thoth.ai ("we", "our", or "company") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use the Thoth WhatsApp application on Bitrix24.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of data:

accountData.title: 2.1 Account Data
items: Bitrix24 authentication information (OAuth tokens)
Bitrix24 portal ID
Application settings

communicationData.title: 2.2 Communication Data
items: Messages sent and received via WhatsApp
Contact information (name, phone number)
Conversation metadata (date, time, status)

technicalData.title: 2.3 Technical Data
items: Access and usage logs
Error and diagnostic information
Integration settings

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
items: Provide and maintain the WhatsApp-Bitrix24 integration service
Synchronize messages between WhatsApp and Contact Center
Process messages with AI when enabled
Improve application quality and features
Send important service notifications
Comply with legal obligations

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We may share your data with:
items: Bitrix24: For integration functionality
WhatsApp providers (Meta/Gupshup): For sending and receiving messages
AI providers: When AI features are enabled (data is anonymized)
Legal authorities: When required by law
dataSharing.noSale: We do NOT sell your personal data to third parties.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
items: Data encryption in transit (TLS/SSL)
Encryption of sensitive data at rest
Role-based access control
Continuous security monitoring
Regular backups and disaster recovery plan

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We keep your data while your account is active or as needed to provide the service. When uninstalling the application, your data is removed from our systems within 30 days, except when retention is required by law.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights (LGPD/GDPR)
yourRights.content: According to data protection laws, you have the right to:
items: Confirm the existence of data processing
Access your personal data
Correct incomplete or outdated data
Request anonymization or deletion of data
Revoke consent at any time
Request data portability
Obtain information about data sharing

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: The application uses cookies and similar technologies to maintain active sessions and improve user experience. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect application functionality.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through the application or by email. We recommend reviewing this page regularly.

dpoContact.content: To exercise your rights or clarify privacy questions, contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO):
